fixes.name: Delta Down All CCY 2Y
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR Term = 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL]
VAR Base = 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down T USD] + 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Fix Value T]
VAR Cond1 = Term IN { "2 Yr", "2Y", "2 Yr Swap", "18 Month", "18 Month Swap", "15 Month", "15 Month Swap", "21 Month", "21 Month Swap" } || (
    'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Market Subtype] = "Major Curve" &&
    'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Risk Date # of Days] > 365 &&
    'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Risk Date # of Days] <= 731
)
RETURN
IF(Cond1, Base, 0) + IF(Term IN { "3 Yr", "3 Yr Swap" }, 2/3 * Base, 0) + IF(Term IN { "4 Yr", "4 Yr Swap" }, 1/3 * Base, 0)
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the Tableau IF/ELSE blocks into a row-level DAX calculated column. Removed Tableau comments, introduced VARs for clarity (Term, Base, Cond1), used IN and logical operators to replicate the OR conditions, and preserved the numeric multipliers (2/3 and 1/3).
